attributes.action: Reduce the number of Westminster MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to reduce the number of Westminster MPs to 50% of the current level. This recognises the impact of devolution in Scotland, Northern Ireland and Wales and ofcourse the legislative powers and cost of the EC.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
